dictionary.name: _code
dictionary.string: "uniform texture f1;&#000a;uniform texture f2;&#000a;&#000a;uniform float speed = 2.0;&#000a;&#000a;color cor;&#000a;float time = mod(TIME * speed, 1);&#000a;&#000a;if(time < 0.5) {&#000a; cor = tex(f1, UV);&#000a;} else {&#000a; if(time < 1) {&#000a; cor = tex(f2, UV);&#000a; }&#000a;}&#000a;&#000a;&#000a;COLOR = cor;"
